70001.name: Banana Shot
70001.desc: Shooting +2% when shooting in close distance
70001.desc_cn: 近距离射门时，射门属性提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
70001.desc_en: Shooting +2% when shooting in close distance

70002.name: Backcourt Shot
70002.desc: 10% chance to ignore range and shoot after taking the ball
70002.desc_cn: 接球后，有10%/15%/20%/25%/30%概率无视距离直接射门
70002.desc_en: 10% chance to ignore range and shoot after taking the ball

70003.name: Power Shot
70003.desc: Opponent goalkeeper has 5% to not react to shooting, and +5% to butterfinger
70003.desc_en: Opponent goalkeeper has 5% to not react to shooting, and +5% to butterfinger

70004.name: Aerial Shot
70004.desc: Head shot percentage +5% when taking a head shot
70004.desc_en: Head shot percentage +5% when taking a head shot

70005.name: Nimble Shot
70005.desc: Shooting percentage +2% when taking a shot
70005.desc_en: Shooting percentage +2% when taking a shot

70006.name: Penalty Master
70006.desc: Penalty kick percentage +5% when taking a penalty kick
70006.desc_en: Penalty kick percentage +5% when taking a penalty kick

70102.name: Taunt Master
70102.desc: Reduce all stats of opponent by 2%/4%/6%/8%/10% when defending them
70102.desc_cn: 防守对手时，降低其全属性2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
70102.desc_en: Reduce all stats of opponent by 2%/4%/6%/8%/10% when defending them

70103.name: Dead Lock
70103.desc: 2% to deadlock the opponents when tackling, increasing their injury
70103.desc_cn: 抢断时，有2%/4%/6%/8%/10%几率使用锁喉神功，使对手受伤程度提高
70103.desc_en: 2% to deadlock the opponents when tackling, increasing their injury

70104.name: Deadly Tackle
70104.desc: Opponents have 2% more chance to get injured when getting tackled
70104.desc_cn: 抢断时，对方受伤几率提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
70104.desc_en: Opponents have 2% more chance to get injured when getting tackled

70105.name: Raging Roar
70105.desc: When the opponent shoots, their attack -2%
70105.desc_cn: 对方射门时，降低其进攻属性2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
70105.desc_en: When the opponent shoots, their attack -2%

70106.name: Diving Save
70106.desc: Saving rate +2% when making a save
70106.desc_en: Saving rate +2% when making a save

70202.name: Quick Pass
70202.desc: Players receiving a pass have their attack +2%
70202.desc_cn: 传球时，接球者进攻属性提高2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
70202.desc_en: Players receiving a pass have their attack +2%

70203.name: Stable Dribble
70203.desc: When dribbling, opponents have -2% tackle success rate
70203.desc_cn: 带球时，降低对方抢断成功率2%/4%/6%/8%/10%
70203.desc_en: When dribbling, opponents have -2% tackle success rate

70204.name: Bridge Dribble
70204.desc: 2% chance to make opponents clueless when driving
70204.desc_cn: 突破时，有2%/4%/6%/8%/10%几率使对手不知所措
70204.desc_en: 2% chance to make opponents clueless when driving

70206.name: Team Leader
70206.desc: All stats +2% for the entire team
70206.desc_en: All stats +2% for the entire team
